item.title: Run.bat hellp and compiler.bat IMPORTANT PLZ
item.dc:creator: @CoderChris CoderChris
item.description:
@CoderChris wrote:

[quote=“xxxxxx 13, post:3, topic:373136”]The best way to solve this problem is to work around the variables and just replace the java command with a direct execution.

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java”

First go to your program files. then the java folder. after you find that, figure out which kind of jdk you have. I assume you have it.

then alter the line i just posted above where it says jdk1.6.0_## change those two numbers. Mine is 18, change it to which ever version you have. then delete the word java. JUST the word java and put in the edited version of the line.

Example:

If you have version 18 that will work just fine to run your command. Just change the 18 to your version.[/quote]

Didnt work im useing 64bit woudnt it be
@echo off
echo running server…
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java” -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main
pause

item.title: Run.bat hellp and compiler.bat IMPORTANT PLZ
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

The best way to solve this problem is to work around the variables and just replace the java command with a direct execution.

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java”

First go to your program files. then the java folder. after you find that, figure out which kind of jdk you have. I assume you have it.

then alter the line i just posted above where it says jdk1.6.0_## change those two numbers. Mine is 18, change it to which ever version you have. then delete the word java. JUST the word java and put in the edited version of the line.

Example:

@echo off
echo running server...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java" -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main
pause

If you have version 18 that will work just fine to run your command. Just change the 18 to your version.

Read full topic
